node.title: Here's how much more you're paying for food and fuel
node.description: Household budgets are feeling the pinch as inflation rises, pushing up the cost of staples like gas and milk.
node.content: ["Americans are paying higher prices this year than\u00a0in roughly three decades. Inflation surged 6.2% in October, paced by steep increases in heating fuel, gasoline and food, labor\u00a0data\u00a0showed last week.", "As inflation rises, here's a closer look at the rise in costs for two major household expenses \u2014\u00a0food and fuel\u00a0\u2014 that have spiked compared with a year ago.", "Related:\u00a0Biden to announce U.S. will release oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve", "For Breaking News & Analysis Download the Free CBS News app"]
